text: jagiui yeonghon-eul paneun salamgwa hananim-i gyesihan geos-eul bulsinhaneun jadeul-ege hananim-i wonhaneun geubun ui jong-ege geubun-ui eunhyega naelyeoji neun geos-eul sigihaneun jadeul wie jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila geudeul-eun bunno-e bunnoleul cholaehayeoss-euni bulsinjadeul-e geneun suchiseuleoun jingbeol-i iss-eul geos ila
